summary.span: 表示包含文件和目录的独立存储区。

span.span: Represents an isolated storage area containing files and directories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此对象对应于一个特定的独立的存储范围内，文件由存在的对象。This object corresponds to a specific isolated storage scope, where files represented by objects exist. 应用程序可以使用独立的存储将数据保存在文件系统中，其自己独立部分中，而无需指定文件系统中的特定路径。Applications can use isolated storage to save data in their own isolated portion of the file system, without having to specify a particular path within the file system. 独立存储区的作用域为特定的程序集，因为大多数其他托管的代码将不能访问您的代码的数据 （高度受信任的托管的代码和管理工具可以与其他程序集访问存储区）。Since isolated stores are scoped to particular assemblies, most other managed code will not be able to access your code's data (highly trusted managed code and administration tools can access stores from other assemblies). 非托管的代码可以访问任何独立存储区。Unmanaged code can access any isolated stores. 有关详细信息，请参阅[独立存储](~/docs/standard/io/isolated-storage.md)。For more information, see [Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/isolated-storage.md). 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 独立存储不适用于 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。Isolated storage is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 相反，使用 `Windows.Storage` API 中包含的 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 命名空间中的应用程序数据类来存储本地数据和文件。Instead, use the application data classes in the `Windows.Storage` namespaces included in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] API to store local data and files. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Windows 开发人员中心的 [应用程序数据](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) 。For more information, see [Application data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) in the Windows Dev Center. ## Examples 下面的代码示例展示了如何在独立存储中创建文件和目录。The following code example illustrates how to create files and directories in an isolated store. 首先，按用户、 域和程序集隔离的存储是检索并放入`isoStore`变量。First, a store that is isolated by user, domain, and assembly is retrieved and placed in the `isoStore` variable. 然后调用方法来创建目录和两个实例类在这些目录中创建文件。The method is then called to create directories, and two instances of the class create files in these directories. summary.span: 获取独立存储的当前大小。

span.span: Gets the current size of the isolated storage.

value.span: 独立存储范围中当前正在使用的存储区的总字节数。

span.span: The total number of bytes of storage currently in use within the isolated storage scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示所有文件和目录的独立的存储范围内的总体使用情况。Represents the total usage of all files and directories within the isolated storage scope. 当前大小不能准确地确定对于参与漫游用户配置文件的存储中。The current size cannot be accurately determined for stores that are participating in a roaming user profile. 漫游配置文件是通常在多个客户端计算机上缓存和更高版本与服务器同步，因为对于此类存储不能强制实施配额并不报告的当前大小。Because roaming profiles are often cached on multiple client machines and later synchronized with a server, quotas cannot be enforced for such stores and the current size is not reported. [如何： 预见独立存储的空间不足的情况](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md)示例演示如何使用属性。The [How to: Anticipate Out-of-Space Conditions with Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md) example demonstrates the use of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 此示例的完整上下文，请参阅概述。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that was occupying. > [!NOTE] > 在发布到最后一个引用前，始终调用 Dispose 。Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the . 否则为资源是使用之前，不会释放垃圾集合调用对象的方法。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开一个独立的存储文件、 使用它将信息写入流，关闭该文件，然后使用方法来释放所有资源。The following code example opens an isolated storage file, uses it to write information to a stream, closes the file, and then uses the method to release all resources. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通配符必须仅为的最后一个元素的`searchPattern`。Wildcard characters must only be in the final element of a `searchPattern`. 例如，"directory1 / * 等\*"是一个有效的搜索字符串，但"\*等 \* /目录"不是。For instance, "directory1/*etc\*" is a valid search string, but "\*etc\*/directory" is not. `searchPattern` "Project\Data \*"将使项目的独立的存储范围中的数据开头的所有子目录。The `searchPattern` "Project\Data\*" will give all subdirectories of Project beginning with Data in the isolated storage scope. `searchPattern` "\*"将返回位于根目录中的所有目录。The `searchPattern` "\*" will return all directories located in the root. 字符串的搜索条件的完整说明，请参阅类。For complete description of search string criteria, see the class. 获取文件的名称的信息，请参阅方法。For information on getting file names, see the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法时，与应用程序相关联的所有程序集使用相同的独立存储区。All assemblies associated with an application use the same isolated store when using this method. 仅当应用程序可以确定标识-例如，应用程序通过 ClickOnce 部署发布或是基于 Silverlight 的应用程序时，可以使用此方法。This method can be used only when the application identity can be determined - for example, when the application is published through ClickOnce deployment or is a Silverlight-based application. 如果尝试使用此方法 ClickOnce 或基于 Silverlight 的应用程序之外，你将收到异常，因为不能确定调用方的应用程序标识。If you attempt to use this method outside a ClickOnce or Silverlight-based application, you will receive an exception, because the application identity of the caller cannot be determined. 在功能上等效于下面的代码： is functionally equivalent to the following code: [!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CPP/remarks.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CS/remarks.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/VB/remarks.vb#21)] 在此代码中，`applicationIdentity`参数`GetStore(IsolatedStorageScope scope, Object applicationIdentity)`是`null`。In this code, the `applicationIdentity` parameter for `GetStore(IsolatedStorageScope scope, Object applicationIdentity)` is `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使应用程序显式请求更大配额大小 （字节）。The method enables an application to explicitly request a larger quota size in bytes. 新的配额大小不能小于当前配额大小，因为仅配额增加允许。The new quota size must not be smaller than the current quota size, because only quota increases are allowed. 每当方法是调用的、 独立存储调用方法。Whenever the method is called, isolated storage calls the method. 您可以通过创建自定义实现策略决策对象，它将覆盖方法，以便该对象可以执行基于策略决策对象。You can implement policy decisions by creating a custom object that overrides the method so that the object can perform policy decisions based on a object. 如果没有自定义对象，配额增加请求被拒绝，因为的默认实现返回`false`。If there is no custom object, the quota increase request is denied, because the default implementation for returns `false`. 目前，没有任何.NET Framework 中的主机提供此自定义，因此始终返回`false`。Currently, none of the hosts in the .NET Framework provide this customization, so always returns `false`.

span.span: is less than current quota size.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值表示在由配额设定的限制内独立存储的最大可用空间。

span.span: Gets a value representing the maximum amount of space available for isolated storage within the limits established by the quota.

value.span: 独立存储空间的限制，以字节为单位。

span.span: The limit of isolated storage space in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用的字节数受管理员设置的独立的存储配额。The number of bytes available is constrained by the isolated storage quota set by the administrator. 因此相同的代码可以接收不同的配额，如果运行不同的证据，证据，根据安全策略中配置配额。Quota is configured in security policy on the basis of evidence, so the same code can receive a different quota if it is run with different evidence. 例如，应用程序的本地运行，并且还从 intranet 上的共享很可能会接收不同的配额。For example, an application that is run locally and also from a share on an intranet would likely receive different quotas. [如何： 预见独立存储的空间不足的情况](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md)示例演示如何使用属性。The [How to: Anticipate Out-of-Space Conditions with Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md) example demonstrates the use of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 此示例的完整上下文，请参阅概述。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. span.span: Removes the isolated storage scope and all its contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 此方法不可挽回地删除整个范围内包含的所有目录和文件。This method irrevocably removes the entire scope and all contained directories and files. 如果正在使用的任何目录或文件存储区中的，在存储区删除尝试失败，并存储被标记为删除。If any of the directories or files in the store are in use, the removal attempt for the store fails and the store is marked for removal. 修改存储区的任何后续尝试引发。Any subsequent attempts to modify the store throw an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法后已清空其内容中删除独立的存储文件。The following code example uses the method to delete the isolated storage file after its contents have been emptied. [如何： 在独立存储中删除存储](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-delete-stores-in-isolated-storage.md)示例还演示如何使用方法。The [How to: Delete Stores in Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-delete-stores-in-isolated-storage.md) example also demonstrates the use of the method.
